Name: Getaway Storm
About the game: Getaway Storm is a simple fun arcade racing game that quickly turns into online multiplayer chaos with friends! Surviving for as long as you can is a team effort, since anyone getting wrecked is a game over for everyone. Let's see how fast you can go and how long you can last. ðŸ˜Ž Features: Online multiplayer with 1-5 players Arcade handling/drifting physics that are just built different ðŸ˜Ž Procedural tracks 13 sus cars to unlock and drive ðŸ˜³ Lots of car crashes Highscore and replay system with different categories
